problem_summary_simple: Maximize consecutive identical characters ('T' or 'F') in a string by changing at most k characters.
problem_summary_technical: Sliding window approach maintaining character counts, expanding window if k is sufficient, shrinking otherwise.
key_insights: This is a classic sliding window problem.
The window size represents the current consecutive sequence length.
The condition to shrink the window is when the number of characters to change (k) is exceeded.
